author: draganrakita
content:
I got a report that the `ecmul_1-2_2_21000_128_d0g0v0_Merge` test didn't add coinbase account fee in `postState` and it remained the same as `preState` state. Can somebody recheck if this is correct?
coinbase from here:
https://github.com/ethereum/tests/blob/05dfbe429bfb9801c8ec814310dd1c7d1304dc81/BlockchainTests/GeneralStateTests/stZeroKnowledge2/ecmul_1-2_2_21000_128.json#L1091
Pre state coinbase balance:
https://github.com/ethereum/tests/blob/05dfbe429bfb9801c8ec814310dd1c7d1304dc81/BlockchainTests/GeneralStateTests/stZeroKnowledge2/ecmul_1-2_2_21000_128.json#L1369
Post state coinbase balance:
https://github.com/ethereum/tests/blob/05dfbe429bfb9801c8ec814310dd1c7d1304dc81/BlockchainTests/GeneralStateTests/stZeroKnowledge2/ecmul_1-2_2_21000_128.json#L1227
